Welcome to Ticket Search.

You can use this app to check if there are any available tickets for your team's next home game, and if so, optionally go to StubHub to purchase tickets for that game.

To use, either:
1) Find your team's stadium on the map and click the symbol. An info window will show.
2) Use the team list to find and select your team. Once you select a team, the map will zoom to the team's stadium location and show the info window.
	* On a phone, click the 'Show Teams menu item'.
	* On a tablet, the team list is already visible in the side panel.

Once the info window is shown, a request will be sent to StubHub to find games for the team. The next home game's information will be displayed in the info window, including the number of available tickets for that game. If there are no upcoming home games or the connection to StubHub fails, you won't be able to see the ticket info.

You can click anywhere in the info window to open your device's web browser to the event page for the game on stubhub.com. For the best experience, install the native StubHub app and click the 'View in app' option. If you choose to use the 'View in browser' option, there may be some issues with certain mobile browsers and StubHub's mobile web pages.

Enjoy!
